summary: The discussion reviewed the status of ongoing sprints SP-001 (Auth and Backend Foundation) and SP-002 (Employee Directory Basics), both in progress since October 31, 2025, with no completed sprints yet. The architect recommended waiting for these to finish, particularly SP-001 for security dependencies, before planning new sprints and offered to propose the next one focused on leave management.

risks.risk: Dependency issues if new sprints are started before current ones complete, especially since Auth (SP-001) is required for secure access in subsequent features.
risks.mitigation: Wait for ongoing sprints to wrap up or monitor the Progress dashboard for status before defining new sprints like SP-003.
